Description: Create ERC-1155 contract with token IDs 0/1, freeClaimed mapping, free + premium mint functions, owner-only premium price setter, USDC + treasury wiring.
Acceptance: Contract compiles and exposes mint/price functions with expected access control.
Notes: Constructor sets USDC + treasury; emit events for mints and price changes.

Description: Write tests for one-time free claim, premium mint USDC transferFrom, and owner-only price changes.
Acceptance: forge test passes covering free-claim rule and premium payment flow.
Notes: Use ERC20 mock for USDC; include revert cases.

Description: Initialize Next.js app configured for static export and add base shadcn/ui layout.
Acceptance: npm run build succeeds with static export settings.
Notes: Target GitHub Pages; keep app router if compatible with export.

Notes: Manual checklist: connect Base mainnet wallet; see balances; claim free once; approve USDC + mint premium; UI updates after tx. Notes: friendly wallet error messaging + network badge added.

Acceptance: UI gating matches token ownership; premium content hidden for non-holders.

Title: Playwright E2E smoke flow

Acceptance: Playwright test passes or manual fallback steps recorded if wallet automation blocks.
Notes: Smoke test covers page load + CTAs; wallet connect/mint remains manual.

Title: WalletConnect integration
Description: Add WalletConnect connector and env support for non-extension/mobile wallets.
